Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to comply with immigration laws

humanitarian_and_compassionate_grounds: hardship due to ties in Canada and risks in Hungary
evidence_assessment: insufficient evidence of unusual hardship or credible risks upon return to Hungary
decision_reasoning: no serious issue, irreparable harm, or favorable balance of convenience
cause_of_action: prevention of removal to Hungary based on humanitarian and compassionate grounds after theft conviction
procedure_followed: Federal Court reviewed the decision denying her application for exemption
result_of_case: motion for a stay of removal was dismissed
